first_translate: that kid is the duke’s proxy?
second_translate: Is that kid the duke’s proxy?

first_translate: it’s so inconvenient being in a child’s body.
second_translate: It’s really uncomfortable being in a child’s body.

hangle: 이 정도로 노골적인 반응이 나올 줄이야….
first_translate: I didn’t think they’d be so obvious about it...
second_translate: I didn't expect such a blatant reaction...

hangle: 날 의심하고 있었다면서 나한테 영주의 권한을 빌려주다니.
first_translate: he was suspicious of me, but he still gave me the authority of a feudal lord.
second_translate: He was suspicious of me, yet he still entrusted me with the authority of a feudal lord.

hangle: 아벨은 왜 내게 이 일을 맡겼을까?
first_translate: why did abel give me this job?
second_translate: Why did Abel entrust me with this task?

first_translate: jeron would’ve been better since he’s older than me.
second_translate: Jeron would’ve been a better choice since he's older than me.

first_translate: well, I’ll think about that later...
second_translate: Well, I’ll think about that later.

first_translate: I just need to do what I was told.
second_translate: I just need to take care of the task given to me.

first_translate: first, I need to figure out how to punish the mercenaries.
second_translate: First, the issue is how to punish the mercenaries.

hangle: 사실 사건을 일으킨 용병을 벌하는 것만큼,
first_translate: it’s important to punish the mercenaries who caused the incident,
second_translate: In fact, just as punishing the mercenaries who caused the incident is important,

first_translate: but it’s also important to think about what the punishment means.
second_translate: But it's also important to consider the significance of this punishment.
It's meant to be an example.

hangle: 똑같은 짓을 저지르면 너 역시 이 꼴이 된다는 경고.
first_translate: it’s a warning to others that they’ll end up the same way if they do the same thing.
second_translate: It's a warning that if they commit the same act, they'll end up like this too.

hangle: 이번 일이 잘되면 마을의 치안에 도움이 되겠지만,
first_translate: if this goes well, it’ll help the town’s public order,
second_translate: If this goes well, it’ll help maintain order in the town,

first_translate: but if the punishment is too weak, it’ll have the opposite effect.
second_translate: But if the punishment is too lenient, it could backfire.
If the punishment is too lenient,

first_translate: people will think, “I can do that too.”
second_translate: People might think, "I could do that too."

hangle: 북부에 어울리는 처벌 방법이 뭐가 있을까….
first_translate: what kind of punishment would be fitting for the north...?
second_translate: What kind of punishment would be appropriate for the North...?

hangle: 음…. 도둑질을 하면 손목을 자르기까지 하니까….
first_translate: hmm... they cut off the hands of thieves...
second_translate: Hmm... They even cut off the hands of thieves...

hangle: 역시 중요 부위를 자를 수밖에 없나….
first_translate: so maybe I should cut off their important parts...
second_translate: Guess that means I have no choice but to cut off their important parts...

first_translate: I should’ve told siegren to go back.
second_translate: I should've just told Siegren to go back.

first_translate: if I’m not going to cut anything off...

hangle: 그래, 이 두 가지 중에 선택하라고 하자.
first_translate: yeah, I’ll let them choose between these two options.
second_translate: Yeah, I'll have them choose between these two options.

first_translate: what was the feudal lord thinking...?
is she really the duke’s proxy?
second_translate: Is she really the duke’s representative?

first_translate: could you please move out of the way?

hangle: 이 상황에 넌 화도 안 나?
second_translate: You're not even mad about this?

hangle: 어쩌다 이런 거친 일을 맡게 된 건지 모르겠지만….
first_translate: I don’t know how you ended up with this rough job,
second_translate: I don't know how you ended up taking on such a tough job,

first_translate: but those men won’t go down without a fight.
second_translate: They won't go down without a fight.

hangle: 하지만 저런 자들이 마을에서 활개 치면
second_translate: But if people like them roam freely in town, doesn’t that make you uncomfortable?

hangle: 어린애가 위험한 자들을 상대하는 걸 보고만 있을 수는 없어요.
first_translate: I can’t just stand by and watch a child deal with dangerous men.
second_translate: I can't just stand by and watch a kid face dangerous people.
May I ask what your name is?

first_translate: thank you for worrying about me, charlotte.
second_translate: Thank you for your concern, Charlotte.
Damn it, let go of me!

hangle: 우리들이 없으면 마물의 밥이나 될 것들이!!
first_translate: you’ll just be monster fodder without us!
second_translate: Without us, you'd just be monster fodder!

first_translate: why are we being punished all of a sudden?!

hangle: 병사 두세 명으로도 감당하기 힘들어 보여.
first_translate: they’re too much for just two or three soldiers to handle.
second_translate: Even two or three soldiers would have a hard time handling them.

first_translate: oh, the freeloader is here too?
second_translate: What? The freeloader is here too?
Using that huge body, they harassed the townspeople...

first_translate: ...and hit young siegren with those big bodies?
second_translate: ...and even hit young Siegren with those big bodies?

first_translate: they also robbed, assaulted, and harassed women...
second_translate: They also committed robbery, assault, and harassed women...

hangle: 살인 외에 저지를 수 있는 건 다 저질렀다지.
second_translate: They did everything short of murder.

first_translate: I’m here under the orders of duke abel heylon.
second_translate: I'm here under the orders of Duke Abel Heylon.

first_translate: who do you think you are, ordering us around?!
second_translate: who do you think you are, you little brat, ordering us around?!

first_translate: you’ll regret treating us like this!
second_translate: You'll regret treating us this way!

hangle: 용병단이 전부 마을을 떠나면 너희들도 다 끝장이야.
first_translate: if the mercenaries leave town, you’re all dead.
second_translate: If the entire mercenary group leaves town, you're all finished.

hangle: 마물이 쳐들어올 때 막아준 게 누군데!
first_translate: who do you think protected you when the monsters attacked?!
second_translate: Who do you think protected you when the monsters attacked?!

hangle: 맞다…. 대화는 말이 통해야 하는 거지?
first_translate: that’s right... conversation only works if the other side listens, right?
second_translate: That's right... Conversation only works if the other side listens.

hangle: 말로 했을 때 들으면 얼마나 좋아.
first_translate: you should’ve listened when I asked nicely.
second_translate: It would've been so much better if you'd just listened the first time.

first_translate: all right, everyone take a seat...
second_translate: All right, everyone, take your seats...
please stay still on your knees.
